articles.content: Carlos Corberan has plenty to think about ahead of Huddersfield Towns play-off clash against Luton Town, not least which team he will pick for the first leg. Recent injuries to key players have made … [+2826 chars]

articles.author: Max Mathews
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund confirm signing of striker Karim Adeyemi in a massive blow to Manchester United - Daily Mail
articles.description: The German side have already sorted out their replacement for Haaland, with Red Bull Salzburg striker Adeyemi joining on a five-year deal, reportedly for a fee of around £32.5million.
articles.content:
Borussia Dortmund have announced the arrival of Karim Adeyemi, on the same day fellow striker Erling Haaland joined Manchester City.
City confirmed the signing of Haaland from Dortmund on Tuesday fo… [+3565 chars]
